resources.string: Enter your SOS message, just don\'t make it too long!\nLink to map with your current position will be appended to the end of the message

Hi, I went crosscountry on horseback and now it seems that I\'m not moving for quite some time.\nIt might be that I\'m resting or just lost my phone , call me to check if all is cool.\nIf it\'s not, here is a link to my current location:
You have to provide a message, here is the default one again
That\'s all! You can start using the app now
